sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Context from "../Context" import { useContext } from 'react' const Publicaciones = () => { const{tienda} = useContext (Context) return (
{tienda.filter((ele)=> ele.id-us).map((ele) =>(
{ele.name}
${(ele.price).toLocaleString("es-Cl")}
))}
) } export default Publicaciones
